dispatcher.translation[0].definitions[0]: someone whose job is to send out vehicles such as taxis or ambulances to places where they are needed
dispatcher.translation[1].definitions[0]: someone whose job is to make sure that goods or workers are sent out at the right time
At the centre, dispatchers keep track of taxis on monitor screens.
dispatcher.translation[1].definitions[1]: the person, company etc that has sent a package, goods etc
The person receiving the parcel in prison could be prosecuted but the dispatcher could not be dealt with.
